cu.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to 'invalid' (unknown enum) will cause logging configuration failure and gNB startup error.

du.explanation_en: Setting pMax to 100 (exceeds maximum allowed power) will cause invalid uplink power configuration error and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pMax 設定為 100（超過允許的最大功率）會導致無效上行鏈路功率配置錯誤，並造成小區設定失敗。
